headline: VALYO: Bold leadership needed to become governor
author: Charlotte Valyo
sentences: Over the past two years Governor Tom Wolf, and elected officials across the Commonwealth and Chester County, have been faced with some of the most challenging decisions ever.
And they have had to do it all while some screamed insults at them, accused them of child abuse, and in Mic ...
They have had to show leadership, patience, and poise, in the face of uncertainty and fear.
They have had to balance health and science with education and the economy.
